title.rendered: Samsung Genuine Black GH98-41290A USB Type-C to Micro USB Adapter Connector Type C Mobile Devices (No Retail Packaging)

content.rendered:
Genuine Samsung Galax Type C Adapter to USB – GH98-41290A It could be very straightforward to use by merely plugging a normal Micro-USB cable into the feminine connector of this Adapter, then plug the male connector of the Adapter into your Type-C system port. You are then ready to use a normal wall or automobile charger for charging or you possibly can select to switch or sync knowledge out of your Type-C system to a pc. (NO RETAIL PACKAGING) Compatible With Samsung: Galaxy A3 2017, Galaxy A5 2017, Galaxy A7 2017, Galaxy Note 7, Galaxy S8, Galaxy S8 Plus, Galaxy Tab S3, Galaxy TabProfessional S

Make positive this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
This is the precise Samsung micro usb to kind C connector contained in the Samsung S8/S8 Plus field.
Converts your current Micro USB equipment to USB C
Use current Micro USB cables and chargers
Perfect for changing Micro USB energy banks to USB-C
Ideal again up or substitute (NO RETAIL PACKAGING)
